rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0727, 3963}

description: The aim of this unit is to develop in students an understanding of the basic principles of pain and wound care management as they relate to nursing, as responsible and appropriate nursing intervention is frequently a determinant of the overall success of therapy. The need for the nurse to develop a broad knowledge base of wound and pain management and therapeutic regimes is considered an essential element of professional clinical practice.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
